product_entries.full_product_description: S4 | Providing, installing, testing and commissioning of Plate electrode earthing station as per IS3043 including the following items  1.400(L)x400(W)x450(D)mm, 150mm thick block work inspection chamber with CI Cover/ Lid.  2. 600x600x3mm copper plate, 15mm GI line / funnel, 50mm line for watering , CI frame and CI cover,Salt & charcoal mixture,M10 bolts & nuts, universal stainless steel clamps. System shall be in full compliance with IS:3043 - 2018 Earthing Standards/ NBC 2016 (latest).  3. Cost to include 75x6 Cu. strips, 3meter lenght connecting clamps with copper plate, brass bolts & nuts as per standards.  4. Cost to include necessary excavation to an extent of 400(W & L), back filling around the Plate.
product_entries.size: inspection chamber: 400(L)x400(W)x450(D)mm, thickness: 150mm, copper plate: 600x600x3mm, GI line: 15mm, watering line: 50mm, connecting clamps: 3 meter length
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: standard: IS3043(indian standard 3043) - 2018, standard: NBC 2016(national building code 2016), cover: CI(cast iron), frame: CI(cast iron), mixture: salt & charcoal, bolts & nuts: M10, clamps: universal stainless steel, strips: 75x6 Cu, bolts & nuts: brass, compliance: full compliance with IS:3043 - 2018 Earthing Standards/ NBC 2016 (latest), excavation: 400(W & L), back filling: around the Plate

System shall be in full compliance with IS:3043-2018 Earthing Standards/ NBC 2016 (latest).  3. Cost to include necessary excavation to an extent of 400(W & L), back filling around the Rod/ Pipe.
